BatchGen is the perfect tool for designers who want to enhance their workflow and bring designs to life with ease.

plugins.name: Component Crafter
plugins.description:
Quickly and easily create and manage your components


Features


1.Create Components or Component Sets

Convert any selected layers into components or component sets, with an option to replace them with their instances.


2.Add layers Directly to Existing Components


3.Replace with Component Instances

Swap selected layers with component instances for better design consistency.


4.Advanced Selection Options

Select layers by shared properties before converting them into components.


5.Clone as New Components


6.Instance Management

  1. Select instances on the current page.
  2. Detach instances on the page or across the file.


7.Detach Components

Break components into editable layers while preserving their appearance.


8.Decompose a Component


9.Multi-Language Support

plugins.name: Token Loader
plugins.description:
Generate a `tokens.json` using something like Style Dictionary.


example tokens.json:


[
{
"name": "core/color/black",
"value": "#000000"
},
{
"name": "alias/color/black",
"value": "#000000",
"aliasOf": "core/color/black"
}
]


Typescript types for the tokens:


interface VariableToken {
name: string; // an/example/name
value: unknown;
}

interface AliasToken extends VariableToken {
aliasOf: VariableToken['name'];
}

type Token = VariableToken | AliasToken;


Next, you can drop in that tokens.json on the plugin window to automatically generate tokens.


Note! It will drop unused ones from the collection, and update existing.
plugins.tagline: A plugin to load tokens (from StyleDictionary), and convert them in to Local Variables

plugins.name: Change Text Field by ID
plugins.description:
A very simple plugin allowing you to set the text of a figma Text element by referencing it's internal node ID.

One way you can get the node ID of your text elements is by fetching your figma 'file' layout data via the figma file API end-point: https://api.figma.com/v1/files/${FIGMA_FILE_KEY}

Then look for your text element and identify it's corresponding ID field.

Else you could try using the 'Text node name to id' plugin.
plugins.tagline: Set the text of a Text element by referencing its node ID

plugins.name: MTG Deckbuilding Tools
plugins.description:
If you love brewing decks for Magic the Gathering, you may feel frustrated with the tools available to you. If only there was a super fluid and performant digital canvas that could let you seamlessly organize and brainstorm decks... Oh wait that's figma!


Normally you'd have to copy and paste all the cards from a decklist into figma. This plugin makes it 100x easier by letting you just paste in a decklist and automatically place images of the cards you're considering into a figma file.


When you're done, you can export a decklist to go buy cards with online or put into Arena or etc. for playing.
plugins.tagline: Import and Export Magic Decklists

plugins.name: QR Code Styler
plugins.description:
QR Code Styler is a feature-packed Figma plugin that allows you to generate and fully customize QR codes directly within your design workflow. Whether you need a simple black-and-white QR code or a beautifully styled one that matches your brand identity, this plugin provides complete creative control.


How It Works:


1. QR Code Generation

Instantly create a QR code by entering any URL, text, or data string. With just a few clicks, the plugin generates a scannable QR code, ready to be styled to fit your design.


Supported Formats:

  1. URLs
  2. email addresses
  3. phone numbers
  4. vCards
  5. plain text


2. Customization Options

Transform standard QR codes into visually appealing design elements with powerful customization features:


  1. Shape Adjustments: Customize the corner radius and dot styles for a unique aesthetic.
  2. Logo Embedding: Place a logo or icon at the center without compromising scannability.


3. Error Correction & Optimization

Ensure scannability even with complex designs by adjusting error correction levels. The plugin optimizes QR codes to remain readable while allowing for creative styling.


Key Features:


Instant QR Code Generation â€“ Create QR codes with various data types in seconds.

Advanced Styling â€“ Customize colors, shapes to match your design.

Logo Embedding â€“ Insert brand logos while maintaining scannability.

Smart Optimization â€“ Adjust error correction levels for reliable scanning.
plugins.tagline: Generate and fully customize QR codes directly within your design workflow.

plugins.name: Companion
plugins.description:
Advanced Color Finder [PRO Feature]

A powerful tool that allows you to search for colors across your files.

  1. Ultra-fast search algorithm with advanced labeling
  2. Colors are grouped by type (variable or style) and by source (Remote or local libraries)
  3. Ability to search by variable name, color hex and by layer name
  4. Display number of matching results per color
  5. Select all or individual layers that matches the selected color


Style Guide Generator [Free]

  1. Transform your color collections into a beautiful style guide
  2. Choose one or more color formats to display (HEX, RGB, HSL)
  3. Support for cross-collections linked variables


Contrast Checker [Free]

  1. Check for AA and AAA level compliance
  2. Interactive and instant results when adjusting colors
  3. Live preview and swap foreground and background colors
  4. Get results for for text (Small / Large) and graphics elements


Tints & Shades Generator [Free]

  1. Interactive generator with live colors preview
  2. Ability to customize the number of generated colors
  3. Built-in contrast checker
  4. Preview generated colors on canvas
  5. Save generated colors to variables


Color Converter [Free]

  1. Convert any given color to popular color formats
  2. Currently supports HEX, RGB, HSL, CMYK, HSV, OKLCH and LAB
  3. Select and copy results


â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•


Sort Layers [Free]

A set of different ways to sort your layers within Figma.

  1. Alphabetical sorting (A-Z or Z-A)
  2. Sort by X or Y position on the canvas
  3. Sort by layer type (Frame, text, group, section, etcâ€¦)
  4. Reverse current sorting
  5. Magically sort everything based on names and positions


Distribute Layers [Free]

A powered up version of Figmaâ€™s built-in distribute feature.

  1. Distribute selected layers horizontally or vertically
  2. Set a desired value for the space between layers
  3. Ability to align layers from top (in horizontal mode) or left (in vertical mode)


Display As Grid [Free]

Quickly rearrange selected layers in a grid layout with improved alignment and sorting features

  1. Ability to choose the number of columns along with vertical and horizontal gaps
  2. Ability to align columns vertically or not
  3. Extra sorting capabilities for better organization


Hidden Layers [PRO Feature]

Simple yet powerful tool to bulk manage hidden layers. It allows you to

  1. Hide selected layers
  2. Show all hidden layers within a page or within a selection
  3. Select all hidden layers within a page or within a selection
  4. Delete all hidden layers within a page or within a selection


Locked Layers [Free]

Simple yet powerful tool to bulk manage locked layers. It allows you to

  1. Lock or unlock selected layers
  2. Lock or unlock all layers on a page


Remove Numbers [PRO Feature]

Get rid of all those annoying numbers that Figma automatically generates. A single click gets the job done


Ungroup Single Layers Group [PRO Feature]

Optimize your files by ungrouping single layers group or deleting empty groups


Start at 0, 0 [PRO Feature]

Itâ€™s just the cherry on top. A file is never tidy unless you start at 0, 0 â€” and for that, we got you covered


â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•


Deep Search [PRO Feature]

Deep Search is a unique and ultra-fast way to find any layer within your file, in a simple yet powerful search tool. The search algorithm has been thoroughly optimized for speed, especially for large files.


Below is how it works:

  1. Start by selecting the layer type (Frame, text, rectangle, etc.) or choose â€œAll Layersâ€ to search everything
  2. Choose one or more properties to search for (Fill color, width, font, opacity and many many more). You can also use the Quick Search box to search for any property from the list for easier access
  3. Hit the search button and voilÃ . Results are there.
  4. Browse the list of matching search results, with ability to filter by layer name.
  5. Click on a result to view it on the canvas or click â€œSelect Allâ€ to bulk select all matching results


Here are some example scenarios:

  1. [Simple] â€• Find all text layers with the font â€œInterâ€ and font weight â€œSemi Boldâ€
  2. [Simple] â€• Find all rectangles with a corner radius of 16 and corner smoothing of 60%
  3. [Medium] â€• Find all instances of a component named â€œButtonâ€ that are hidden and have been detached
  4. [Medium] â€• Find all auto layouts that have a minimum width of at least 393px
  5. [Advanced] â€• Find all instances of an external library component named â€œInputâ€ that are marked as ready for dev and whose top left corner radius is less than or equal to 20px
  6. [Advanced] â€• Find all layers that have a hidden stroke, have a blend mode applied and whose name include the characters â€œesâ€


In short, the possibilities are endless


â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•


MagiConnect [PRO Feature]

MagiConnect is a simple and easy to use tool that allows you to draw connectors between your frames


Here are some key features:

  1. Auto-draw mode: When enabled, it allows you to quickly draw connectors between any two elements you select on the canvas. The direction of the connector arrow is based on the selection order
  2. Manual mode was designed to give you more flexibility in accessing nested layers before drawing a connector. Itâ€™s slower for sure, but gives you more control
  3. You can customize the connector by adjusting the color, opacity, stroke width, radius and stroke style
  4. If youâ€™re not happy with the connector customizations, you can always reset all values to their default state from the manage menu
  5. You can also add an optional description to annotate the connector
  6. The tool will always remember your last used settings whenever itâ€™s launched the next time.
  7. You can update specific connectors within a selection or update globally across a page
  8. In cases where a fresh start is the way to go, simple go to â€œManageâ€ and select â€œRemove all connectorsâ€. This will delete all connectors youâ€™ve added on this page


â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•â€•


When you purchase the license, you will get a lifetime unlimited access to the plugin, and all to the upcoming features that iâ€™m planning to add. Some really exciting features are coming soon. This is truly the beginning.


Due to limitations from Figma, you can only access PRO features from the account you purchased the license on. You will not be able to access PRO features from connected accounts and must purchase the license again if you want to use it on another account.


Future releases of the plugin might not be at the current price tag.


If you made it this far, I salute you for your patience.


For any questions, ideas, bugs or complaints, I would love to hear from you. Please feel free to reach out.

plugins.name: PSD Importer for Figma
plugins.description:
Import your PSD files directly into Figma. It preserves the design elements such as layer structure, text properties, and complex styles, offering a smooth transition from Photoshop to Figma.


There are 2 import methods.

  1. Import all layers with maximum compatibility.
  2. Import each layer is bitmap image.


While the plugin strives for high accuracy, some discrepancies may occur due to differences between Photoshop and Figmaâ€™s rendering engines - particularly with complex effects, blending modes, and certain layer styles. In cases where features canâ€™t be translated, some layers may be imported as images.


Users can try the plugin with three free PSD imports, after which unlimited access is available through an $8/month subscription.
plugins.tagline: Easily import your PSD files in just a few clicks.

131547.release_notes:
Import Settings
------------------------------------
New options allow for custom pin dimensions or automatic framing based on the exact dimensions of original Pinterest pin images.

Persistent Authorization
------------------------------------
The plugin now retains your Pinterest authorization between sessions, so you no longer need to reauthorize each time.

Pinterest Account Management
------------------------------------
You can now unlink your Pinterest account from the plugin, making it easier to switch between multiple accounts as needed.

Additional Improvements
------------------------------------
The interface has been reorganized with separate tabs for Boards and Import Settings to improve usability. Clearer status messages offer better feedback during the import process. Authorization errors and expired tokens are now handled more gracefully with automatic recovery.

plugins.name: Hue Converter
plugins.description:
Hue converter plugin uses color formulas to correct color deviation issues on the in-vehicle screen and ensure consistency between the design and the in-vehicle screen colors.


You can select a single element or the entire interface, scan it, convert individual colors or all of them, and even convert the colors of the entire page.
plugins.tagline: Uses color formulas to correct color deviation issues on the in-vehicle screen

107922.name: Hue Converter
107922.description:
Hue converter plugin uses color formulas to correct color deviation issues on the in-vehicle screen and ensure consistency between the design and the in-vehicle screen colors.


You can select a single element or the entire interface, scan it, convert individual colors or all of them, and even convert the colors of the entire page.
107922.tagline: Uses color formulas to correct color deviation issues on the in-vehicle screen

plugins.name: HCT Variablinator
plugins.description:
HCT Variablinator generates a color palette following Google's HCT color theory. It can then create a Figma Variables collection with all the tones created. You can then reference these through Aliases in your other collections.


Future features:

  1. Mode support - create new modes with same tokens to support different brands / themes
  2. Code gen for theming using style-dictionary for plug and play

plugins.name: Optimize Images for Web
plugins.description:
Optimize Images for Web streamlines your entire image export workflow:


  1. Batch-optimize & export: Process every image on a page at once, then download them as a ZIP.
  2. Global compression & resize: Dial in a single set of quality and dimension settings that apply to all assets.
  3. Flexible formats: Choose PNG, WebP, or JPEG output to suit any platform or use case.
  4. Consistent renaming: Automatically rename exports in kebab-case or snake_case for tidy, predictable filenames.


With just a few clicks, youâ€™ll have web-ready images â€” optimized, resized, correctly named, and packaged â€” without ever leaving Figma.
plugins.tagline: Batch-optimize, compress, rename, and export web-ready images (webp).

plugins.name: Color Nexus
plugins.description:
Color is one of the most important tools for designers. Beyond its intrinsic properties, design also requires attention to the combination, contrast, and harmony between colors.To address these needs, we created Color Nexus, To present the contrast and harmony between colors, making the analysis and adjustment process more intuitive, professional, and convenient.


ColorNexus v2.0

New Feature: Intelligent Image Color Extraction

Easily extract three sets of professional color palettes from any image! ColorNexus v2.0 utilizes multiple advanced algorithms to provide diverse color inspirations for your designs.


V2.0 Key Features:

  1. Multi-Algorithm Support: Different algorithms are used to extract color palettes, ensuring diversity and uniqueness.
  2. Quick Switching: One-click to switch between different color schemes, making the operation simple and reliable.
  3. Flexible Adjustment: Adjust the extracted colors freely according to project requirements.


Operation Steps:

1.Select an Image: Choose any image in your Figma document.

2.One-Click Extraction: Click the image icon to quickly extract a color scheme.

3.Freely Switch and Adjust: Click the image icon repeatedly to switch between the three sets of color palettes. You can also fine-tune the extracted colors according to your needs. ColorNexus provides convenient color adjustment tools.


ColorNexusV1.0

Key Features:

  1. In ColorNexus, you can adjust the hue values of a group of colors within the same color wheel, intuitively observing the angular positional relationships of each color on the wheel. This allows you to quickly identify whether they are complementary colors, analogous colors, or any other contrasting relationships.


  1. ColorNexus utilizes the HSL model, ensuring that hue, saturation, and lightness are presented in a symmetrical relationship, providing a reliable foundation for your color analysis. Simultaneously, each color's saturation and lightness are displayed on the adjustment axis, allowing you to gauge the contrast strength by their positions relative to each otherâ€”the further apart they are, the more intense the contrast. This empowers you to create a myriad of color combinations.


  1. Additionally, ColorNexus supports one-click switching between RGB and RYB modes, enabling you to view color contrasts that are more aligned with traditional art theories.


  1. Overall, ColorNexus not only helps you create a harmonious and visually pleasing set of colors but also ensures that these colors form an organic whole, rather than isolated individual elements.


Color Addition Methods:

Extract colors from Figma documents.

Input 16-digit hexadecimal color values.

Quickly add basic colors.


Color Output:

After adjustments, hover over the color block and click the download icon to export the color to the current Figma canvas.


Use Cases:

Starting from Scratch: Use ColorNexus to create a brand-new color palette.

Expanding Existing Tones: Input one or several tones and easily add more colors to complement them.

Inspiration Capture: Input beautiful color combinations into ColorNexus, which will display the relationships between colors, helping you better understand and adjust them, thereby improving your color adjustment skills.


Tips:

The RYB color wheel does not support hue adjustments because its color gamut has a nonlinear relationship with RGB, and RGB is the most accurate for adjustments on computers.

The color wheel's drag handle automatically avoids overlap when hues are close, making operation convenient.

With a clean interface that matches Figma's light and dark themes, ColorNexus runs quickly and smoothly, making it an ideal color adjustment plugin.
plugins.tagline: effortlessly combine colors

plugins.name: Frame Presets
plugins.description:
This free plugin allows the user to create frames with a specified name, width, and height in the 'Create New Preset' tab. The user can then scroll through their presets in the 'View & Alter Presets' tab or use the search bar for their convenience. Additionally, in the 'View & Alter Presets' tab by clicking on the preset's name the user will be able to confirm the preset's information and apply that frame within their Figma file. Each preset also provides the user with the option to edit its parameters or delete it from local memory.


https://www.buymeacoffee.com/cuddlybeast
plugins.tagline: Create, delete, edit, and apply your own custom frame presets.

plugins.name: Gridder
plugins.description:
A simple tool to generate grids and/or sort layers in ascending or descending layer name order.


How to use


Sorting: Select a group of layers, then select the sort direction.

Gridding: Select a group of layers, then select either the column count or row count. Then adjust the spacing values.


Combine the two use for rapid organized grid creation and maintenance.


From yours truly,

Ryan Nono
plugins.tagline: A simple tool to generate grids and/or sort layers in ascending or descending layer name order.

plugins.name: Apply modes to all pages
plugins.description:
This plugin works by replicating the current page selected variable modes to every other page of the document.


Instructions

  1. Set the desired modes in the current page.
  2. While in the page, run the plugin.
  3. Check the other pages to see if the modes were applied correctly.


Useful information:

  1. The plugin will replace modes within the same collection.
  2. The plugin will not remove modes. If a page has an additional collection that is not in the current page, it will keep it.
  3. For large files, it might take a little while for the plugin to finish running, wait for a message saying â€âœ¨ All done! âœ¨â€. It might also take a while for the file to finish uploading.
plugins.tagline: Replicate Current Page Mode in all pages of the document

plugins.name: Quick Section
plugins.description:
Features

  1. Create sections without manually changing colors each time.
  2. Add headers to organize your frames horizontally or vertically.
  3. Access features through the UI or quick menu actions.
  4. Set up keyboard shortcuts to perform quick menu actions faster.


How it works

  1. Select the layers you want to organize.
  2. Click an option from the UI or run it from the plugin menu.
  3. Sections and headers are created and aligned to your selections.


Alternatively, you can add sections or headers directly on the canvas without selecting any layers.
